data.lyric:
[ti:Saturday Nights REMIX (Explicit)]
[ar:Khalid/Kane Brown]
[al:Saturday Nights REMIX (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Saturday Nights REMIX (Explicit) - Khalid/Kane Brown
[00:03.64]Lyrics by：Kane Brown/Khalid Robinson/Ryan Vojtesak/Jamil Chammas/Josh Hoge
[00:07.28]Composed by：Kane Brown/Khalid Robinson/Ryan Vojtesak/Jamil Chammas/Josh Hoge
[00:10.92]Saturday nights blueberry cigarillos
[00:15.13]Swishers make my throat hurt
[00:17.00]Rolling OCB's on the side for me
[00:19.80]Light 'em up and let 'em both burn
[00:22.38]Family feuds say your mom's confused
[00:25.60]Off of s**t she doesn't wanna learn
[00:27.93]But daddy's gone say he's never home
[00:31.51]And wishing only makes it worse
[00:33.76]I guess there's certain dreams that you gotta keep
[00:39.55]'Cause they'll only know what you let 'em see
[00:44.61]All the things that I know
[00:47.04]That your parents don't
[00:49.67]They don't care like I do
[00:52.83]Nowhere like I do
[00:55.79]All the things that I know
[00:58.47]That your parents don't
[01:01.19]They don't care like I do
[01:04.15]The way that I do
[01:07.05]The way that I do
[01:12.78]The way that I do
[01:19.42]Saturday nights your works shoes are stilettos
[01:23.66]Smell of cheap perfume
[01:25.54]Make up on your face try to hide the pain
[01:28.35]All the lies look like the truth
[01:30.64]Deep in your heart all you want is love
[01:34.08]But you never felt good enough
[01:36.64]You got wrapped up in other plans
[01:39.87]But this ain't the way the story ends
[01:42.45]I guess there's certain dreams that you gotta keep
[01:48.12]'Cause they'll only know what you let 'em see
[01:53.08]All the things that I know
[01:55.56]That your parents don't
[01:58.37]They don't care like I do
[02:01.23]Nowhere like I do
[02:04.35]All the things that I know
[02:06.99]That your parents don't
[02:09.76]They don't care like I do
[02:12.67]The way that I do
[02:15.58]The way that I do
[02:19.00]'Cause I care I care I care about you
[02:23.33]Do do do
[02:24.73]There's nowhere I'd rather be
[02:26.81]Than right here right now
[02:29.02]Do do do
[02:30.70]I care I care care about you care about you
[02:36.34]There's nowhere I'd rather be
[02:38.73]All the things that I know
[02:41.33]That your parents don't
[02:43.96]They don't care about you
[02:46.94]Nowhere like I do
[02:50.31]All the things that I know
[02:52.75]That your parents don't
[02:55.58]Don't care about you
[02:58.37]The way that I
[03:01.23]The way that I do
[03:07.03]The way that I do
[03:09.52]Do do do
[03:11.57]Do do do
[03:12.97]The way that I do
[03:15.66]The way that I do
[03:18.47]The way that I do I do
[03:23.00]Do do do
data.trans:
[ti:Saturday Nights REMIX (Explicit)]
[ar:Khalid/Kane Brown]
[al:Saturday Nights REMIX (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.64]//
[00:07.28]//
[00:10.92]周六晚上 蓝莓小雪茄
[00:15.13]抽了Swisher Sweets牌的雪茄 我喉咙肿痛
[00:17.00]狂欢 有个疯狂的妹子在我旁边
[00:19.80]让他们嗨起来 点燃激情
[00:22.38]家庭不和 你妈妈是不是很困惑
[00:25.60]有些东西她根本不想明白
[00:27.93]爸爸走了 他说再也不回家了
[00:31.51]祈求上天垂怜并不能改变什么
[00:33.76]我觉得 有些梦想你必须坚守
[00:39.55]人们只看到你的表面
[00:44.61]我知道的那些事情
[00:47.04]连你的父母也不知道
[00:49.67]他们不像我一样关心你
[00:52.83]不管哪一方面都是如此
[00:55.79]我知道的那些事情
[00:58.47]连你的父母也不知道
[01:01.19]他们不像我一样关心你
[01:04.15]像我一样关心你
[01:07.05]像我一样关心你
[01:12.78]像我一样关心你
[01:19.42]周六晚上 你穿着细高跟鞋工作
[01:23.66]喷上廉价香水
[01:25.54]脸上浓妆艳抹 只为掩盖痛苦
[01:28.35]说出的谎言让人信以为真
[01:30.64]你的内心深处 只是渴望爱
[01:34.08]你总是觉得不够好
[01:36.64]你忙着完成各种计划
[01:39.87]但这不应该是故事的结局
[01:42.45]我觉得 有些梦想你必须坚守
[01:48.12]人们只看到你的表面
[01:53.08]我知道的那些事情
[01:55.56]连你的父母也不知道
[01:58.37]他们不像我一样关心你
[02:01.23]不管哪一方面都是如此
[02:04.35]我知道的那些事情
[02:06.99]连你的父母也不知道
[02:09.76]他们不像我一样关心你
[02:12.67]像我一样关心你
[02:15.58]像我一样关心你
[02:19.00]我真的很在乎你
[02:23.33]关心
[02:24.73]我哪也不想去
[02:26.81]此刻只想留在这里
[02:29.02]关心

[02:36.34]我哪也不想去
[02:38.73]我知道的那些事情
[02:41.33]连你的父母也不知道
[02:43.96]他们不像我一样关心你
[02:46.94]不管哪一方面都是如此
[02:50.31]我知道的那些事情
[02:52.75]连你的父母也不知道
[02:55.58]他们不关心你
